original_text: And for his sister a virgin, that is nigh unto him, which hath had no husband; for her may he be defiled.
korean_text: 출가하지 아니한 처녀인 그의 자매로 말미암아서는 몸을 더럽힐 수 있느니라

sentences.original_text: And for his sister a virgin
for her may he be defiled
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 위해 그는 부정하게 될 수 있다
